1.name: Backstab
1.details: Yui’s basic attack behind the target critical strikes for 2 - 4% of the target’s current health as bonus physical damage.

2.name: Flying Kunais
2.details: Yui launches 5 kunais in a cone-shaped direction, dealing 10 / 25 / 40 / 55 / 70 (+20% physical power) for each kunai hit.

3.name: Blade Spin
3.details: Yui spins around with her blades, dealing 70 / 90 / 110/ 130 / 150 (+80% physical power) physical damage to all nearby enemies and reducing their movement speed by 20 / 25 / 30 / 35 / 40% for 1.5 seconds.

4.name: Substitute
4.details:
Yui replaces herself with a wooden dummy that lasts for 5 seconds and appears behind a target enemy, dealing 70 / 100 / 130 / 160 / 190 (+70% physical power) physical damage.

All on-going projectiles will go to the dummy instead and it can be destroyed with 4 hits.

After 1 second, Yui can recast Substitute again to replace the dummy with herself if it’s still there.

5.name: Smoke Screen
5.details: Yui detonates a smoke bomb, becomes stealthed for 2.5 / 3 / 3.5 seconds and gains 30 / 35 / 40% increased movement speed.Enemies hit by the smoke bomb will take 40 / 80 / 120 / 160 / 200 (+40% physical power) physical damage and have reduced vision for 1 / 1.5 / 2 seconds.
